original_text: So you also, when you have done all that you were commanded, say, ‘We are unworthy servants; we have only done what was our duty.’”
korean_text: 이와 같이 너희도 명령 받은 것을 다 행한 후에 이르기를 우리는 무익한 종이라 우리가 하여야 할 일을 한 것뿐이라 할지니라

sentences.original_text: when you have done all that you were commanded
sentences.korean_translation: 너희에게 명령된 모든 것을 다 행했을 때에

sentences.original_text: we have only done what was our duty.'
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 마땅히 할 일을 한 것뿐이라'
